website_summaries.verdict: Random quaking action brings a new risk factor to the game, but original Jenga players will still enjoy the same stacking strategies. Game play is notably faster than original Jenga.
pros: Unpredictable base vibrations add challenge to game
Longer game play than Jenga Boom
Shaking element does not automatically topple tower
cons: Uses cheaper plastic blocks, not original finished wood
Base can be difficult to shut off

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed in this game and would return for normal jenga ...
customer_reviews.text: To be perfectly honest, I am disappointed in this game and would return for normal jenga if I could. The product information said the pieces were wooden; they are not. They are cheap, hollow plastic that doesn't stay in the tower nicely even without the base vibrating. My daughter thinks it is cool but it isn't a game we will play much and we play a lot of games.
customer_reviews.author: ERRT

customer_reviews.title: great game, fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: great game, fun for the kids. the pieces are a bit less in weight than i was expecting but still fun
customer_reviews.author: nick peterson

customer_reviews.title: A fun twist on the original Jenga
customer_reviews.text: A fun twist on the original Jenga. In the end I will pick original Jenga because it is fun to see how far you can go. The quake turns Jenga into a timed game
customer_reviews.author: TexasAV8R

customer_reviews.title: as described and fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: More fun than I expected. we are already a jenga fan and this mades it one step more challenging than the orginial one.
customer_reviews.author: PDUBSNY

customer_reviews.title: Fun game. The vibrating base makes it funnier for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. The vibrating base makes it funnier for the kids. I had a hard time turning it off and usually, just let it be until it turns off on its own.
customer_reviews.author: E. Macias

customer_reviews.title: Works great, lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My small groups are enjoying this fun version of Jenga!

customer_reviews.title: Great game with patience
customer_reviews.text: My son has been asking for this for over a year. We played it yesterday and he loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun , you never know when the tower is going to move. My grandson gets so excited when , the tower starts vibrating and , the blocks get out of place. If you want a great game , that keeps your family laughing ,get this game.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene howell

customer_reviews.title: Quaker factor isn't working.
customer_reviews.text: I put in batteries for the quaker and pressed the button. It only quaked for 1 round and never worked again. Feels like just regular Jenga.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Lee

customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to play with my grandkids and I love it! We had so much fun with it. It was exactly as promised.

customer_reviews.title: Jenga Quake takes Jenga to the next level!
customer_reviews.text: This game keeps me on the edge of my chair. It is edgy, unpredictable and - most of all - fun :-)

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited for this game when we saw it. However the jenga pieces are plastic which makes them more difficult to stack and handle then the wood pieces. It has not been a hit with my son.

customer_reviews.title: The original Jenga is more fun. Great concept

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made

customer_reviews.title: New twist to an old game

customer_reviews.title: Quake game caution
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect it to be plastic and found it not acceptable to me. I gave it away immediately.

customer_reviews.title: If it ain't broke...
customer_reviews.text: My son begged for this game. He anxiously opened it and maybe played with it twice. He says it crashes too quickly and is not worth the trouble of restacking. The original Jenga is still the favorite at our house.
customer_reviews.author: M.Cooper

customer_reviews.title: great fun

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: After the whole xmas hype of this i bought it. And ummm did not like it at all. The pieces are plastic and hard to stack. Took us more time to stack then to play. Its safe to say that its just collecting dust. Nothing like the original one
customer_reviews.author: vlahaki0829_ 41

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son. Opened the package ready ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. Opened the package ready to play and there are no cards in the box. So how am I supposed to play?
customer_reviews.author: Kat

product_meta.title: Jenga Quake Game
product_meta.description:
Jenga Quake Game

BRAND STORY
By Hasbro Games
feature_bullets: Jenga Quake game adds a new, shaky twist to the classic game
Base vibrates randomly to shake up the game
Win by being the last one to pull out a block before the tower collapses
Includes 36 orange and gray Jenga blocks, base and instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars140 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
